'''Notes'''
The only thing I couldn't make working is internal microphone (if there is one?) and hibernate.
Apart from this everything works our of the box without need for proprietary drivers. Multimedia buttons at the top of keyboard works fine:
* internet browser
* multimedia applicatin
* play/pause
* previous track
* next track
